| HistoryText             = Sword were a team of [[Deviants (Homo descendus)|Deviants]] that acted as the [[Damocles Foundation (Earth-616)|Damocles Foundation]]'s enforcers. One of its members, [[Ulysses Bloodstone (Earth-616)|Ulysses Bloodstone]], left the Foundation and Sword out of concern of the experiments the Foundation was doing. When he left, he helped in the escape of [[Arcadia DeVille (Earth-616)|Arcadia DeVille]], one of the Foundation's test subjects.{{r|X-Force Vol 1 83}}

Sword was tasked to bring Ulysses back dead or alive along with Arcadia. Ulysses and Arcadia were corned in a Kentucky coal mind by Sword member [[Argos (Deviant) (Earth-616)|Argos the Hunter]]. The mutant [[Samuel Guthrie (Earth-616)|Cannonball]] arrived to aid the pair and managed to break Argos' staff. Then the rest of Sword arrived to aid Argos.{{r|X-Force Vol 1 83}}

When Sword confronted Cannonball, Ulysses, and Arcadia, Arcadia used her powers to summon [[X-Force (Earth-616)|X-Force]]. X-Force managed to defeat Sword by defeating Sword's members one at a time. Bloodstone and Arcadia took possession of Sword's ship and took Sword's members prisoner.{{r|X-Force Vol 1 84}}

Sword later got free and were charged with defending the Damocles Foundation base and once again fought X-Force. [[Selene Gallio (Earth-616)|Selene]] took control of the Foundation's Celestial Gathered and used its power to turn Sword's members into lizards. The Gatherer was later destroyed by [[Danielle Moonstar (Earth-616)|Moonstar]] and Arcadia, but its unknown if Sword's members to revert to normal.{{r|X-Force Vol 1 97}}
